artist: Artist: After Hans Holbein the Younger; Engraver: David Deuchar
description: two images on one sheet upper image: man plowing a field in a rectangular frame; biblical scenes in frame around central frame; on sides a figure on a pedestal at left and a skeleton on pedesal right lower image: king seated on throne holding a sword, surrounded by a group of people with a skeleton above head; various figures in rectangular frame around image
dimension:
4 7/16 × 3 3/4 in. (11.27 × 9.53 cm) (image, sheet, upper image)
4 9/16 × 3 13/16 in. (11.59 × 9.68 cm) (image, sheet, lower image)
11 7/8 × 9 1/4 in. (30.16 × 23.5 cm) (mount)
title: Print
